item.title: Nightmare Country (The Sandman Universe)
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/sandman-nightmare-country.webp'); } The Sandman Universe: Nightmare Country. James Tynion IV; Lisandro Estherren; Yanick Paquette; Andrea Sorrentino. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . sandman.fandom.com . 2022. Tynion IV won Eisner’s “Best Writer” award for 2023. Snapshots MR. ECSTASY. Dreams are a trap. They comfort and they coddle. They comfort and they coddle. They give false hope, and false understanding.
